meta-review.comment: Solium Infernum is a devilishly deep strategy game that demands patience and cunning from its players. This game isn't for the faint of heart, but for those willing to embrace its intricacies, a devilishly delightful time awaits. The visual flair and compelling mechanics make it a hellishly addictive experience. While it may not be everyone's cup of tea, for strategy enthusiasts, it's a match made in gaming hell.
